channel.title: Advanced on Harvester manual test cases
channel.description: Recent content in Advanced on Harvester manual test cases

item.title: Change api-ui-source bundled
item.description: Log in as admin Navigate to advanced settings Change api-ui-source to bundled Save Refresh page Check page source for dashboard loading location Expected Results Log in should complete Settings should save dashboard location should be loading from /dashboard/_nuxt/ (verify it in browser’s developers tools)

item.title: Change api-ui-source external
item.description: Log in as admin Navigate to advanced settings Change api-ui-source to external Save Refresh page Check page source for dashboard loading location Expected Results Log in should complete Settings should save dashboard location should be loading from https://releases.rancher.com/harvester-ui/latest (verify it in browser’s developers tools)

item.title: Change log level debug
item.description: Log in as admin Navigate to advanced settings Edit config on log-level Choose Debug Save Create two VMs Reboot both VMs Download Logs Expected Results Login should complete Settings should save VMs should create VMs should reboot sucessfully Logs should show Debug level output

item.title: Change log level Info
item.description: Log in as admin Navigate to advanced settings Edit config on log-level Choose Info Save Create two VMs Reboot both VMs Download Logs Expected Results Login should complete Settings should save VMs should create VMs should reboot sucessfully Logs should show Info level output

item.title: Change log level Trace
item.description: Log in as admin Navigate to advanced settings Edit config on log-level Choose Trace Save Create two VMs Reboot both VMs Download Logs Expected Results Login should complete Settings should save VMs should create VMs should reboot sucessfully Logs should show Trace level output

item.title: Set backup target S3
item.description: Log in as admin Navigate to advanced settings Edit config on backup-target Choose S3 Set valid S3 target Save Expected Results login should complete Settings should save You should not get an error message

item.title: Set backup-target NFS
item.description: Log in as admin Navigate to advanced settings Edit config on backup-target Choose NFS Set valid NFS target Save Expected Results login should complete Settings should save You should not get an error message

item.title: Set backup-target NFS invalid target
item.description: Log in as admin Navigate to advanced settings Edit config on backup-target Choose NFS Set invalid NFS target Save Expected Results login should complete Settings should save You should get an error message

item.title: Set backup-target S3 invalid target
item.description: Log in as admin Navigate to advanced settings Edit config on backup-target Choose S3 Set invalid S3 target Save Expected Results login should complete Settings should save You should get an error message
